list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Introduced new Validator, Book, Fraction, and Car classes
Added a new Validator class for universal input validation and updated current classes to utilize this validator. Introduced new classes - Book, Fraction, and Car, with corresponding fields and methods. Updated tasks.

project.component: { "keyToString": { "Application.MainTest.executor": "Run", "RunOnceActivity.OpenProjectViewOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "SHARE_PROJECT_CONFIGURATION_FILES": "true", "WebServerToolWindowFactoryState": "false", "git-widget-placeholder": "master", "ignore.virus.scanning.warn.message": "true", "kotlin-language-version-configured": "true", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.detected.package.tslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "node.js.selected.package.tslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm", "onboarding.tips.debug.path": "C:/Users/blazh/IdeaProjects/Memory model in Java. Syntax for working with classes in Java/src/Main.java", "project.structure.last.edited": "Modules", "project.structure.proportion": "0.15", "project.structure.side.proportion": "0.2", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "ml.llm.AIAssistantPromptsLibrary", "vue.rearranger.settings.migration": "true" } }

task.summary:
# Add Human class and configure project settings
Implemented a Human class with relevant methods and attributes. Also, configuration files for IntelliJ IDEA were added including .idea/workspace.xml, .idea/vcs.xml, .idea/misc.xml, .gitignore and .idea/modules.xml files. Various project settings like auto import, task manager, project ID, and language level were set. In addition, generated a MainTest.java for testing.

Update project with new Validator class and City class
This commit introduces a new Validator class used to centralize logic for validating different types of inputs. Changes in Human class reflect the use of this new Validator. The commit also adds a new City class with corresponding fields and methods. Other minor changes include updated paths in the ChangelistManager and tweaks to workspace settings.

# Introduced new Validator and Country classes
The codebase has been updated with a new Validator class used to centralize logic for validating different types of inputs. A new Country class has also been implemented along with corresponding fields and methods.

Introduced new Validator, Book, Fraction, and Car classes
Added a new Validator class for universal input validation and updated current classes to utilize this validator. Introduced new classes - Book, Fraction, and Car, with corresponding fields and methods. Updated tasks.
